class reviews.views.ReviewCloseView(**kwargs)[source]¶

Bases: braces.views._access.GroupRequiredMixin, django.views.generic.edit.UpdateView

form_class¶

alias of reviews.forms.ReviewCloseForm

form_valid(form)[source]¶

If the form is valid, save the associated model.

get_form_kwargs()[source]¶

Adds allow_long_route_continuation to the form_kwargs. The long route continuation is only allowed for short route Reviews that are not of preliminary assessment Proposals.

get_initial()[source]¶

Set initial values: - continuation to GO if review was positive - in_archive to True as long as we are not dealing with preliminary assessment

get_success_url()[source]¶

Returns the supplied URL.

group_required = 'Secretaris'¶

class reviews.views.SupervisorDecisionOpenView(**kwargs)[source]¶

Bases: braces.views._access.GroupRequiredMixin, reviews.mixins.CommitteeMixin, django.views.generic.list.ListView

This page displays all proposals to be reviewed by supervisors. Not to be confused with SupervisorView, which displays all open reviews for a specific

supervisor. Viewable for the secretary only!
context_object_name = 'decisions'¶
get_queryset()[source]¶

Returns all studies that still need conclusion actions by the secretary

group_required = 'Secretaris'¶
template_name = 'reviews/decision_supervisor_list_open.html'¶
class reviews.views.SupervisorView(**kwargs)[source]¶

Bases: braces.views._access.LoginRequiredMixin, django.views.generic.list.ListView

This page displays all proposals to be reviewed by a specific supervisors. Not to be confused with SupervisorDecisionOpenView, which displays all open reviews for all supervisors.
